xaikit.adapters package¶

Submodules¶

xaikit.adapters.adapter_interface module¶

class xaikit.adapters.adapter_interface.ModelAdapterInterface¶

Bases: object

Interface for Model adapters.

The goal of this interface is to create a shared interface for models from different libraries (scikit-learn, keras, etc.). Models wrapped in this interface can then be used with the explaining methods.

Should not be created directly, use create_model_adapter() factory instead.

abstract predict(x)¶
